effect.name: Background Colour Replace
effect.description:
Replace a specific colour in the background with another, with tolerance amount
Last Updated: 2026-01-11 00:54
effect.author: Unknown, improved and ported to DX11 by NaitorStudios

parameter.name: Target Colour
parameter.description: The Colour to be replaced by another

parameter.name: Tolerance
parameter.description: 1.0 = Only exact colour replaced, 0.0 = Any colour replaced

parameter.name: Use Animation as Tint
parameter.description: Choose to use animation frames as tint rather than a single colour (no alpha channel)

parameter.name: Tint Colour
parameter.description: Colour to replace the target colour

parameter.name: Attempt Blending
parameter.description: Attempt to blend tint depending on how close the colour is to target colour.

parameter.name: Invert Effect
parameter.description: Invert the effect, making the object's texture visible only where the target color does not match.
